description.zh-cn: 明末政治人物。崇祯四年进士，曾任辉县知县、兵部主事、湖广佥事等职。后擢为河南巡抚，未及上任，因张献忠攻破襄阳而不屈殉国。
description.en: A political figure of the late Ming Dynasty. After passing the imperial examination in 1631, he served in various roles including Magistrate of Huixian, Secretary in the Ministry of War, and Surveillance Commissioner in Huguang. He was later promoted to Governor of Henan, but was killed by Zhang Xianzhong's forces in Xiangyang before he could assume office.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖，大西政权的建立者。
description.en: A leader of the peasant rebellions in the late Ming Dynasty and the founder of the Daxi regime.

description.zh-cn: 明末大臣，曾任东阁大学士、督师，负责围剿农民起义军。
description.en: A minister of the late Ming Dynasty who served as Grand Secretary of the East Cabinet and Supreme Commander, responsible for suppressing peasant rebellions.

description.zh-cn: 明朝武官，任守备，在与农民军作战时于武安县战死。
description.en: A military officer of the Ming Dynasty with the rank of Shoubei (Garrison Commander), who was killed in action against peasant rebels in Wu'an County.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，任推官，在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: An official of the Ming Dynasty with the rank of Tuiguan (Judge), who died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，任摄县事，在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: An official of the Ming Dynasty serving as an acting county magistrate, who died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝武官，任游击，在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: A military officer of the Ming Dynasty with the rank of Youji (Mobile Corps Commander), who died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明末时期由农民组成的起义武装力量的泛称。
description.en: A general term for the rebel armed forces composed of peasants during the late Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝山西潞安府下辖的一个县，是张克俭的籍贯所在地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Lu'an Prefecture, Shanxi, during the Ming Dynasty, and the ancestral home of Zhang Kejian.

description.zh-cn: 明朝湖广地区的军事重镇，张克俭等人在此地被张献忠杀害。
description.en: A key military stronghold in the Huguang region during the Ming Dynasty, where Zhang Kejian and others were killed by Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝河南省下辖的一个县，张克俭曾在此地任知县。
description.en: A county in Henan Province during the Ming Dynasty, where Zhang Kejian once served as magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期的一个县，农民军曾在此地与明军交战。
description.en: A county during the Ming Dynasty where peasant rebels clashed with Ming forces.

description.zh-cn: 位于辉县的一所书院，曾被农民军占领屯驻。
description.en: An academy in Huixian that was once occupied and garrisoned by peasant rebels.

description.zh-cn: 张克俭的籍贯为山西潞安府长治县。
description.en: Zhang Kejian's ancestral home was Changzhi County, Lu'an Prefecture, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯四年（1631年）中进士后，张克俭被授予河南辉县知县一职。
description.en: After passing the imperial examination in 1631, Zhang Kejian was appointed as the Magistrate of Huixian County, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 于崇祯十二年（1639年）考选后，擢升为湖广佥事，先后负责岳州和襄阳的兵备。
description.en: After being selected in the 1639 evaluation, he was promoted to Surveillance Commissioner of Huguang, responsible for military preparations in Yuezhou and later Xiangyang.

position.zh-cn: 都察院右佥都御史、巡抚河南
position.en: Right Vice Censor-in-Chief of the Censorate and Governor of Henan

description.zh-cn: 于崇祯十四年（1641年）二月被擢升为巡抚河南都察院右佥都御史，但未及上任即殉国。
description.en: In February 1641, he was promoted to Governor of Henan and Right Vice Censor-in-Chief, but died before assuming the post.

description.zh-cn: 杨嗣昌任督师并将襄阳设为军府时，张克俭作为其下属深得倚仗，负责监军等事务。
description.en: When Yang Sichang served as the Supreme Commander and established his military headquarters in Xiangyang, Zhang Kejian, as his subordinate, was deeply trusted and responsible for military supervision.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠率军攻破襄阳城，张克俭被执后不屈被杀。
description.en: Zhang Xianzhong's forces captured Xiangyang, and Zhang Kejian was executed after being captured and refusing to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: Died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: Died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 在张献忠攻破襄阳时殉职。
description.en: Died in the line of duty when Xiangyang fell to Zhang Xianzhong.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯六年（1633年），时任辉县知县的张克俭成功率众抵御了农民军的进攻。
description.en: In 1633, Zhang Kejian, then Magistrate of Huixian, successfully led the defense of the county against an attack by peasant rebels.

description.zh-cn: 崇祯六年（1633年）春，农民军进攻武安县，守备曹鸣鹗战死。
description.en: In the spring of 1633, peasant rebels attacked Wu'an County, and Garrison Commander Cao Ming'e was killed in the battle.

description.zh-cn: 在进攻辉县失败后，农民军在百泉书院屯驻了三日。
description.en: After failing to capture Huixian, the peasant rebel army garrisoned at Baiquan Academy for three days.
